CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier Newspaper, January 3, 1953, pg. 11, reads: "Leading Characters - Playing major roles in the Christmas cantata, 'Babe of Bethlehem,' at Park Place AME Church, Homestead, were the following: Armstrong Thomas, Walter Bill, Claire Ford and Samuel Staples.  The cantata was directed by Mrs. Catherine C. Gardner. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Armstrong Thomas, Walter Bill, Claire Ford, and Samuel Staples wearing robes for "Babe of Bethlehem" Christmas cantata, Park Place AME Church, Homestead
